ru.jango.j0loader

Class JSONLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.jango.j0loader.DataLoader<T>
      • ru.jango.j0loader.ParamedLoader<org.json.JSONArray>
        • ru.jango.j0loader.JSONLoader

  • public class JSONLoader
extends ParamedLoader<org.json.JSONArray>
    Special loader for handling JSON responses. Simply decodes response string with JSONArray and JSONObject.

    NOTE: ALWAYS returns JSONArray to DataLoader.LoadingListener. If a response contains a JSONObject, then a JSONArray will be created manually and listeners will receive a JSONArray with one JSONObject in it.
